content: fairy maiden size yarn women s medium 440 yards sock yarn gauge quince & co tern 9 stitches = 1 in stockinette in sea star needles notions us size 1 / 2 50 mm circulars darning needle or size needed to obtain stitch markers gauge cable needle cuff co 64 stitches using old norwegian cast on method or your using your favorite cast on divide stitches evenly 32 stitches per needle and join to work in the round being careful not to twist the yarn and place marker if needed to indicate beginning of round twisted ribbing cuff as follows *k1tbl p1* repeat until end of round and repeat ribbing for 10 rounds or desired length of cuff begin chart pattern for leg of sock and knit to desired length heel flap heel flap is knit on n2 the instep stitches on n1 can be left on hold this slipstitch heel is worked flat across 32 stitches the first stitch is slipped on every row as if to purl this creates a chain along each side of the heel flap knit these 2 row until you have 16 chain stitches along the sides of heel flap row 1 rs *sl1 k1* repeat these 2 stitches to end row 2 ws sl1 purl to end turn short row heel turn continue knitting on n2 for heel turn you will now use short row to turn the heel row 1 rs k18 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn row 4 ws sl1 p to 1 stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn continue working row 3 & 4 back and forth until all stitches have been worked ending with a k2tog on rs and p2tog on ws 18 stitches gusset knit across 9 heel turn stitches and place marker this denotes the new beginning of the round begin first decrease round by knitting 9 heel turn stitches at heel flap edge pick up and knit into the chain selvedge stitches by inserting needle under the chain stitch join instep stitches and continuing with the chart pattern for instep stitches only pick up and knit into the chain selvedge stitches on other side of heel flap then knit to marker first round is complete and now you will begin decreasing as follows round 1 k to last 3 stitches on n2 k2tog k1 k instep in pattern on n2 k1 ssk k to end of the round round 2 k one round with no decreasing and continue the chart for instep knit these 2 rounds until you have decreased to 64 stitches knit foot until 1 75 less than desired foot length toe begin toe decreases round 1 k to last 3 stitches on n2 k2tog k1 on n1 k1 ssk knit across to last 3 stitches k2tog k1 on n2 k1 ssk knit to end of round one decrease round complete round 2
